name: Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer (itch)
description:
Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer is your classic sliding puzzle game featuring beautiful Waifus just for you!

___________________________________________ Classic Sliding Puzzle

The classic sliding puzzle with increasing difficulty.

FREE Waifus

10 free Waifus in the base game!

3 FREE DLC's

2 FREE DLC image packs and a FREE backgrounds DLC for a total of 51 FREE Waifus! 

*All free and paid DLC are Steam exclusive.*

High Quality Waifus

All your Waifus are in 4k!

Waifu Gallery

Easy to use gallery to see your Waifus up close!

Chill Music

Chill lofi music to enjoy with your Waifus. 

Technical Settings

All the settings you need, including resolution, fullscreen, framerate cap, vsync and more!

*Please note that Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer contains no adult content*

___________________________________________ Be sure to check out the other apps and games Kink Master Studios has to offer!
